courses.description: This is a Python basic programming course. Here you can learn Python syntax, its variables, operators, conditions, loops and many more. With just 40 minutes you can be Python no one to a beginner one. You will be surprised that Python is one of the most popular programming language in the world. So learn it, make your way with Python 3.
